keyPolicies.policyDescription: There should be free car parking for all at Ipswich hospital as it is wrong to make money out of people who are ill or from visiting friends or relatives. Doctors and nurses should also park for free. The money charged does not go towards the NHS but is just profit for the car parking company.

Immigration so our government can sort out the backlog of asylum seekers, find out who is here and deport those who claim to have been rejected. Foreign criminals must be deported immediately. We need tougher sentences for violent criminals, rapists, and murderers, and must catch them and prison them, and most importantly do not let them re-offend.
Re-open Broomhill Pool in Ipswich which would be a great asset to the local community with its many facilities.
Support a unitary authority for Central Ipswich to stop the duplication of Suffolk and Borough Councils. This would empower Central Ipswich and ensure it has more control over its local affairs.

issues.governance: Support a unitary authority for Central Ipswich to stop the duplication of Suffolk and Borough Councils. This would empower Central Ipswich and ensure it has more control over its local affairs.
issues.health: There should be free car parking for all at Ipswich hospital as it is wrong to make money out of people who are ill or from visiting friends or relatives. Doctors and nurses should also park for free.
issues.immigration: Immigration so our government can sort out the backlog of asylum seekers, find out who is here and deport those who claim to have been rejected.
